readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.AdventureGuild_KillList_Header:
------------------------------
			 --Monster Eradication Goals--
             "Help us keep the valley safe."
------------------------------
content.AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_VoidEgg: A new chick hatched... It looks odd.
content.BeachNightMarket_SubmarineInUse: The submarine is currently in use. Come back later.
content.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverClosed: Merchant: The night market starts at 5pm... visit me then for a free cup of coffee!
content.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverQuestion: Merchant: Hello there! Care for a cup of coffee?
content.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverEnjoy: Merchant: Mmm... smells great, doesn't it?
content.BeachNightMarket_PainterClosed: Famous Painter Lupini: Come back when the market opens, if you wish to purchase my fine work.
content.BeachNightMarket_PainterQuestion: Famous Painter Lupini: I'm selling this painting for 1200g. What do you say?
content.BeachNightMarket_PainterSold: Famous Painter Lupini: My apologies... I have no more paintings to sell today.
content.BeachNightMarket_WarperQuestion: Shrouded Figure: I can send you home for 250g.
content.Beach_FixBridge_Question: Use 300 pieces of wood to fix the bridge?
content.Beach_FixBridge_Hint: Hmmm... With 300 pieces of wood this could be fixed.
content.Beach_GoneFishingMessage:
Gone fishing.

   I'll be back tomorrow.
content.Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: Old Mariner: Glad the amulet worked out for ye, {0}.
content.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Old Mariner: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one you intend to marry.
content.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Old Mariner: I can see that sparkle in yer eye, {0}. Ye must be head over heels in love. But I'm afraid a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage.
content.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Old Mariner: Ah, I can see it in yer eyes... There be a special someone in yer heart. Just so happens I'm sellin' a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Give that to yer intended and they'll know exactly what you mean.
content.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: Old Mariner: I've got this old amulet to sell... but somethin' tells me yer not ready for it, {0}.
content.BusStop_BuyTicketToDesert: Buy a ticket to Calico Desert for 500g?
content.BusStop_DesertOutOfService: The bus to Calico Desert is out of service.
content.BusStop_NoDriver: Please return when a bus driver is present.
content.BusStop_ReturnToHorse2: Your loyal horse waits patiently for your return.
content.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion1: We are the Junimos... Keepers of the forest.
content.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion2: This house was empty for years... The trees moved in and so did we.
content.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion3: We're happy to help... It's not our house, after all.
content.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion4: So many wonderful bundles... thank you! Thank you!
content.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion5: When we're done here, we'll return to the other world.
content.CommunityCenter_JunimosReturned: The Junimos have returned to the spirit world.
content.Farm_1SlimeEscaped: A slime escaped during the night.
content.Farm_GrandpaNote:
{0}-

Wait for my return on the dawn of your third year.

-Grandpa
content.Farm_GrandpaShrine_PlaceDiamond: You place the diamond on Grandpa's Shrine.
content.Farm_GrandpaShrine_DiamondSlot: There's a diamond-shaped slot in the shrine... was that always there?
content.Forest_WizardTower_Locked: It's locked. You can hear someone inside, though.
content.Forest_OpenedSewer: You unlock the sewer hatch with the Rusty Key!
content.Desert_BusArrived: Alright, kid. Just get back on the bus when you're ready to go home.
content.Bus_NoDriver: You'll have to wait until Pam's on duty to ride the bus.
content.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Male: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter his bedroom.
content.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Female: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter her bedroom.
content.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Couple: You're not good enough friends with {0} or {1} to enter their bedroom.
content.FarmHouse_Bed_GoToSleep: Go to sleep for the night?
content.MensLocker_WrongGender: That's the men's locker room... you can't go in there!
content.WomensLocker_WrongGender: That's the women's locker room... you can't go in there!
content.WizardTower_WizardShrine:
The Shrine Of Illusions  
Make an offering of 500g to change your appearance?
content.Desert_SandDragon_Initial: Its maw gapes at the desert sun. Even in death, it yearns for a taste.
content.Desert_SandDragon_ConsumeEssence: You place the essence in the dragon's maw. Only then do you notice a note hidden in the eye socket:
content.Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -Mr. Qi'
content.Railroad_Box_ConsumeShell: You throw the shell into the box. Immediately, a note falls down from the rafters above:
content.Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -Mr. Qi'
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_Singleplayer: Pelican Town Ledger Book... It looks like the mayor uses this to keep track of finances.
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_NoFarmhands: If any farmhands join your farm, you can transfer money to each other.
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Clie: Pelican Town Ledger Book... The owner of the farm can request the mayor to split the funds of the farmhands.
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Sepa: Split the funds of each farmer? Tonight, the money will be divided evenly. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: It's the mayor's ledger book. What would you like to do?
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Me: Merge the funds of each farmer? Tonight, everyone's money will be combined. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Tr: Who would you like to send money to?
content.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: How much money would you like to send?
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_NoSpouse: Pelican Town Marriage Log... After marriage, you may file for divorce here. Let's hope that isn't necessary!
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question: File for divorce? There is a 50,000g fee.
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled: Your divorce request has been cancelled.
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed: Your divorce papers have been filed, but your spouse won't know until tomorrow morning. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
content.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_Initial: It's the mayor's fridge. It's mostly full of milk and iced tea.
content.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_ConsumeBeets: You quickly place the beets in the fridge. Wait a sec... there's a note taped to the milk. It's addressed to you:
content.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -Mr. Qi'
content.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_Initial: It's a battery powered lock-box. Unfortunately, there's no battery in it.
content.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_ConsumeBattery: It worked! The lock-box swings open. Inside, there's a note:
content.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -Mr. Qi'
content.SkullCave_SkullDoor_Unlock: You insert the skull key into the keyhole. It's a perfect fit!
content.Farm_GreenhouseRuins: Whatever this once was, it's now in ruins.
content.Saloon_Arcade_PK_NewGame+: Press button for a more difficult journey...
content.JoshHouse_Alex_Trash: There's a bunch of protein bar wrappers.
content.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like Sam cleans his trash bin regularly.
content.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: It's full of clothes... wait. There's a sword hidden under the clothes.
content.Submarine_SubmergeQuestion: Captain: Ahoy there! Want to take the deep-sea fishing tour? It'll cost ya 1,000g.
content.Submarine_AscendQuestion: Captain: Shall I take us back up?
content.Submarine_Done: Captain: We're back! Make sure not to leave any fish lying around.
content.Mines_MineElevator_NotWorking: It doesn't seem to be working...
content.Mines_ResetMine:
Reset your progress in the mine?
(You'll be back at mine level 1).
content.Club_CalicoJack_HS: This table's for the big shots. It's a 1000 coin bet.
content.Club_CalicoJack: Wanna play some CalicoJack? This is the 100 coin table.
content.Club_QiCoins_BuyStarter: You have 0 Club Coins. Buy a starter pack for 1000g?
content.Club_ClubSeller: Psst... I have a 'Statue of Endless Fortune' for sale... only 1,000,000g. What do you say?
content.Club_ClubSeller_NotEnoughMoney: Hey, I said 1,000,000g! This isn't gonna cut it.
content.Town_DwarfGrave_Translated:
You translate the dwarvish:     

Stand between the pillars three
With gift as precious as the sky:
A rainbow forged from land, not sea
Then galaxies will heed your cry.
content.Town_mgThiefMessage: Shadow Guy: Eeeeep! You caught me! I'm sorry! Take it! Take it! It looked so valuable, I couldn't help myself...
content.Town_SpecialCharmQuestion: Driver: Hey kid... I need a lucky break... why don't 'cha bring me a 'rabbit's foot'? I'll make it worth your while.
content.Town_specialCharmNoFoot: Driver: Come back when you got a 'rabbit's foot' on ya, kid.
content.LockedDoor_FriendsOnly: It's locked... Only {0}'s friends can enter uninvited.
content.ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu: What can I do for you?
content.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at Caroline's place for aerobics club.

-Robin
content.ArchaeologyHouse_Rearrange: Would you like to rearrange the museum's collection?
content.HaleyHouse_EmilyRoomObject: There's a tape inside:'Freeform Dance Rhythyms'
content.Club_CalicoJack_Rules1: The objective is to get as close to 21 as possible. Cards range from 1 to 9, except for the first card which can be as high as 11. Each player starts with two cards, but the dealer's first card remains hidden. Each turn you can choose to draw a random number between 1 and 9 or pass.
content.Club_CalicoJack_Rules2: Once you pass, the dealer's hidden card is revealed. She must draw until her total reaches or exceeds 18. If either player exceeds 21 on their turn, they lose. If the dealer passes, then all cards are revealed and the highest score wins.
content.Club_CalicoJackHS_NotEnoughCoins: You need at least 1000 coins to play here.
content.Club_CalicoJack_NotEnoughCoins: Hey, the betting's fixed at 100 coins. You don't have enough. Go buy some coins from the machine if you want to play.
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse1: I can increase the size of your house and add a kitchen. It will cost 10,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 450 pieces of wood. Are you interested?
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse2: I can increase the size of your house and add a nursery. It will cost 50,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 150 pieces of hardwood. Are you interested?
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse3: I can add a cellar to your house. The cellar can be used to age certain products, like wine and cheese. It will cost 100,000g. Are you interested?
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build Pam a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood1: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 450 pieces of wood.
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood2: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 150 pieces of hardwood.
content.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood3: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 950 pieces of wood.
content.Farm_WeedsDestruction: The spreading weeds have caused damage to your farm.
content.JojaMart_SignUp: If you become a Joja Member, the community center will become a Joja Warehouse, and you will no longer be able to refurbish it. However, Joja will provide an alternative means to improving the town. Are you sure you want to join?
content.Mines_Overrun: This area is overrun with monsters.
content.Railroad_TrainComing: A train is passing through Stardew Valley
content.Town_SeedShopSign:
- Pierre's General Store -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!
content.Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of Lewis' old pickup truck...
content.Sewer_DogStatue: -Statue Of Uncertainty-^The statue can help you change professions.^Make an offering of 10,000g?
content.Sewer_DogStatueQuestion: Which skill's professions would you like to change?
content.Sewer_DogStatueAlready: This skill is already being altered tonight. Come back tomorrow...
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineLeft: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^Your children will turn into doves and fly away...^Make an offering of one Prismatic Shard?
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineLeftInactive: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^The statue stares through you...
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineCenter: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The relationship between you and your ex-spouses will be wiped from memory. It will be like you've never met.^Make an offering of 30,000g?
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineCenterInactive: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The statue stares through you...
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineRightActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be lifted, allowing monsters to appear on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
content.WitchHut_EvilShrineRightDeActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be restored, preventing monsters from appearing on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
content.WitchHut_NoOffering: You don't have the necessary offering.
content.Sewer_MagicSeal: There's some kind of force-field blocking your path.
content.Woods_Statue:
--Old Master Cannoli--
...Still searching for the sweetest taste...
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question_Krobus: Kick Krobus out of your house?
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled_Krobus: You've changed your mind about kicking Krobus out.
content.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed_Krobus: You've decided to kick Krobus out of the house. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
content.Theater_MovieEnd: The movie has concluded for tonight. We hope you enjoyed the show!
content.HaleyHouse_SewingMachine: It's a sewing machine... But I'm not sure how to use it.
content.HaleyHouse_DyePot: An array of brightly colored dyes.
content.Caroline_Sunroom_Door: Caroline only lets her friends enter here...
content.Caroline_Tea_Event1: When I'm alone with relaxing tea...
content.Caroline_Tea_Event2: My mind is empty and free to wander...
content.Desert_Trader_Closed: Closed until the 18th for the Pelican Town night market.
